130567.<voice 00051_00130567><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00051_00130567><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>I am Gunza the Swordsman. I travel the world to collect
Key Emblems to prove my strength.<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130568.<voice 00190_00130568><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00190_00130568><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>However, the people of this town are all kind of
eccentric, aren't they? They complain that the wind
has stagnated, but it seems perfectly fine to me.<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130569.<voice 00289_00130569><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00289_00130569><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>But now is the perfect time! If I can be of aid to
Lord Taketora here, he may even give me a Key Emblem!<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130570.<voice 00590_00130570><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00590_00130570><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>Lord Taketora's house is the enormous mansion at the
far end of town.<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130571.<voice 01037_00130571><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01037_00130571><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>First, you should aim for the big red gate on the south
side of the mansion.<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

130572.<voice 01077_00130572><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01077_00130572><start_lip_sync n00262 _normal m00001>Then just head up the stairs and keep going. If you're
interested in the Key Emblem as well, you can ask about
it there.<stop_lip_animation n00262 CLOSE_MOUTH>

302.<voice 00174_00000302><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00174_00000302><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Oh, Fuura! Welcome home!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

304.<voice 00405_00000304><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00000304><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I know that you're still intent about this, but
please, Fuura, try to be a little more open-minded.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

41429.<voice 00405_00041429><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00041429><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Don't be so downhearted that you didn't pass the Trial
of Young Leaves! In fact, it's a good thing that you
gave up.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

306.<voice 00533_00000306><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00533_00000306><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>It's your sovereign duty to follow in Kazayura's
footsteps and become a Wind Rider.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

307.<voice 00642_00000307><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00642_00000307><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I don't want to be a Wind Rider... and I definitely
won't ride an Azlantelope!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

308.<voice 00747_00000308><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00747_00000308><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>It was an accident, Fuura... It wasn't the Azlantelope's
fault.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

310.<voice 00957_00000310><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00957_00000310><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Moreover, I've heard that Yokiji's not feeling very
well lately...<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

312.<voice 01148_00000312><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01148_00000312><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Fuura. We haven't held the Wind Send-Off Ceremony in
this town for six years now.
<auto_br=3500>
The winds have stagnated, and the number of complaints
by ailing townsfolk has been on the rise.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

313.<voice 01190_00000313><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01190_00000313><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>As lord of Azlan, it is my obligation to select the new
Wind Rider to perform the Wind Send-Off Ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

317.<voice 01555_00000317><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01555_00000317><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>The same Azlantelopes which were fond of Kazayura have
taken a liking to you as well.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

318.<voice 01645_00000318><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01645_00000318><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I don't know... I don't like Azlantelopes. Besides,
I'm not...anything special.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

319.<voice 01724_00000319><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01724_00000319><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>There is no one else who shares your gift. Why won't
you consider using it for the benefit of others?<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

320.<voice 01834_00000320><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01834_00000320><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Go and cool your head, Fuura. Calm your heart and think
things through.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

321.<voice 02233_00000321><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02233_00000321><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>As you just witnessed, Azlan's experiencing somewhat of
a problem of late.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

322.<voice 02342_00000322><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02342_00000322><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>The Wind Send-Off ceremony can't take place unless
Fuura agrees to become the Wind Rider. But it's not
like I'm heartless...<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

323.<voice 02462_00000323><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02462_00000323><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I know what I said, but if my daughter continues to
stubbornly refuse to carry on our tradition, I'll have
to find another way.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24802.<voice 02586_00024802><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02586_00024802><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Are you a traveler? Hmm... I like the look in your
eyes.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9224.<voice 02586_00009224><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02586_00009224><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Have you come from the Garden of Learning? Then you
must already be familiar with Fuura.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

324.<voice 02664_00000324><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02664_00000324><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Forgive me, but I must request your aid. Please see
Fuura and ask her what's on her mind...<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9225.<voice 02678_00009225><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02678_00009225><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I am ashamed to say that my daughter does not open up
to me. But if you... You have the eyes of someone who
could bridge that gap.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28555.<voice 02678_00028555><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02678_00028555><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I'm ashamed to confess that my daughter has never
opened up to me. But perhaps she will to you.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28557.<voice 02690_00028557><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02690_00028557><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Fuura's room is just across the hall. Thank you, and
sorry for the inconvenience.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24614.<voice 00030_00024614><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00030_00024614><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Oh, do you have business with Lady Fuura?<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24619.<voice 00180_00024619><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00180_00024619><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Sorry, but if it's the young lady you're after, she
just left to visit the cemetery.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

326.<voice 00210_00000326><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00210_00000326><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>If you leave north of town you'll find Windweep Cape
where young lady Fuura's mother... Mistress Kazayura's
grave is.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

327.<voice 00260_00000327><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00260_00000327><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>Whenever she's distressed, she always goes to that grave.<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

24615.<voice 00319_00024615><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00319_00024615><start_lip_sync n00256 _normal m00001>...Hey, you there. If you have some business with Fuura,
why don't you go to Windweep Cape?<stop_lip_animation n00256 CLOSE_MOUTH>

329.<voice 00060_00000329><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00060_00000329><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>!? H-help me...!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

331.<voice 01010_00000331><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01010_00000331><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Wh... Why did you...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

332.<voice 01130_00000332><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01130_00000332><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I didn't need your help!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000631.<voice 01230_19000631><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01230_19000631><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I hate you... Ah!!! Ah!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000636.<voice 01356_19000636><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01356_19000636><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Cakey... Cakey... Cakey... Huh?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000637.<voice 01357_19000637><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01357_19000637><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Cakey... My.. My Cakey...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000638.<voice 01358_19000638><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01358_19000638><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>T... Thank you...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000639.<voice 01934_19000639><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01934_19000639><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>...T-that was uncalled for!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

336.<voice 02014_00000336><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02014_00000336><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>If you went after Cakey and died or something... It'd
be a big inconvenience for me!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

337.<voice 02109_00000337><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02109_00000337><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Just go already!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

338.<voice 02328_00000338><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02328_00000338><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Never thought I'd see you here,
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

339.<voice 02388_00000339><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02388_00000339><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Oh, congratulations on your graduation from the Garden
of Learning. I felt bad because I forgot to tell you.
I was in a rush...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

340.<voice 02458_00000340><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02458_00000340><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>U-umm... You are? Come to think of it, I met you
earlier in my father's room.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

341.<voice 02518_00000341><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02518_00000341><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>So, your name is <pc>. I'm Fuura, daughter of
the lord of Azlan.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

342.<voice 02608_00000342><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02608_00000342><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Just now...that was...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

343.<voice 02668_00000343><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02668_00000343><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I shouldn't act like that towards the Azlantelope who
just saved me... You must think I'm a heartless person,
don't you?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

344.<voice 02728_00000344><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02728_00000344><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Heheh... You sure are honest.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

345.<voice 02728_00000345><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02728_00000345><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Really...? Thanks. That's really kind of you.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28558.<voice 02781_00028558><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02781_00028558><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>...My mother was one of the greatest Wind Riders in
Azlan's history. That's why everyone adored her.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28559.<voice 02836_00028559><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02836_00028559><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I can still envision her riding the Azlantelopes as
though she were dancing, while I looked on from afar...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28560.<voice 02948_00028560><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02948_00028560><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I really do wish that I could follow in my mother's
footsteps and become a Wind Rider, just like my father
said... But, well...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

346.<voice 03059_00000346><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03059_00000346><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>My mother... Fell from here and died.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

347.<voice 03337_00000347><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03337_00000347><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>While she was trying to save a young Azlantelope that
had fallen from the cliff and gotten stuck...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

348.<voice 03535_00000348><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03535_00000348><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Had the Azlantelope not been there, my mother would
still be with me...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

349.<voice 03924_00000349><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03924_00000349><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>This is... My mother's favorite flower?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

351.<voice 04159_00000351><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04159_00000351><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>So the Azlantelopes left this as an offering. Even
after six years, they still...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

352.<voice 04292_00000352><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04292_00000352><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I... Had forgotten that my mother liked these flowers...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

356.<voice 04604_00000356><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04604_00000356><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I don't know if I'll ever truly like Azlantelopes,
but... I wouldn't mind at least performing the Wind
Riding. For the sake of the people of Azlan!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

357.<voice 04934_00000357><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04934_00000357><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>, thanks for listening! It was kind
of refreshing.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

358.<voice 05004_00000358><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 05004_00000358><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm going to go tell my father that I've decided to be
the Wind Rider!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

359.<voice 05064_00000359><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 05064_00000359><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>See you later, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

360.<voice 00025_00000360><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00025_00000360><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>! I've been awaiting you. It seems
that you managed to recall Fuura from Windweep Cape.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

361.<voice 00070_00000361><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00070_00000361><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I was awaiting her return with the intention of
informing her that I no longer had need for her to
become a Wind Rider.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

362.<voice 00095_00000362><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00095_00000362><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>But just a few minutes ago, Fuura came back and told
me that she wished to be a Wind Rider after all!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

363.<voice 00125_00000363><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00125_00000363><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I don't know what spurred this sudden change of heart,
but I couldn't be more delighted.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

364.<voice 00197_00000364><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00197_00000364><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Now then. I see that you have a Mark of Adulthood.
Are you perhaps traveling to collect the Key Emblems?<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

365.<voice 00321_00000365><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00321_00000365><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>In that case, I must ask to place my trust in you again!<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

366.<voice 00351_00000366><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00351_00000366><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>For Fuura to become a Wind Rider and perform the
ceremony, she must retrieve the two sacred items, the
Wind Reins and the Wind Robe.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

368.<voice 00451_00000368><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00451_00000368><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>I would like you to please aid her in obtaining the
items and returning safely.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9226.<voice 00471_00009226><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00471_00009226><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>If you successfully see the Wind Send-Off Ceremony to
completion, I shall bestow you the Green Key Emblem.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9227.<voice 00486_00009227><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00486_00009227><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>Fuura is already on her way to the mountain pass to
retrieve the first sacred tool, the Wind Reins. If you
leave now, you should be able to catch up with her there.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9228.<voice 00516_00009228><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00516_00009228><start_lip_sync n00255 _normal m00001>The mountain pass is located south of Inamino Highway
in the South Azlan Region. Please offer her your aid.<stop_lip_animation n00255 CLOSE_MOUTH>

369.<voice 00415_00000369><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00415_00000369><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>! Why are you here...?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

370.<voice 00542_00000370><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00542_00000370><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>...I see. My father asked you to come.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

371.<voice 00592_00000371><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00592_00000371><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>, guess what! I defeated a monster!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

372.<voice 00622_00000372><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00622_00000372><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Well, the Azlantelopes helped without my asking...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

373.<voice 00672_00000373><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00672_00000373><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>But it just goes to show that anything's possible!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

375.<voice 00762_00000375><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00762_00000375><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Wow, this is amazing. I've heard that Wind Riders are
loved by the Azlantelopes...<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

376.<voice 00812_00000376><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00812_00000376><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Seems the young lady is destined to be the next Wind
Rider after all. You're Fuura from the town of Azlan,
right?<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

378.<voice 00892_00000378><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00892_00000378><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Excellent! Then, please accept the item which milord
requested!<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

380.<voice 01090_00000380><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01090_00000380><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Now then. Listen closely, young miss Fuura. You see
that enormous tower over there?<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

381.<voice 01145_00000381><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01145_00000381><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>The other sacred item, the Wind Robe, is in the Sui
Tower waiting for a new Wind Rider to come and fill it
with the power of wind.<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

382.<voice 01175_00000382><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01175_00000382><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>Only those who are recognized by the tower as the
Wind Rider can open the door to the top floor where
the Wind Robe is enshrined.<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

383.<voice 01205_00000383><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01205_00000383><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>There, young lady, it seems you'll be tested on whether
or not you are worthy of being the Wind Rider.<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

384.<voice 01265_00000384><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01265_00000384><start_lip_sync n00257 _normal m00001>The Azlantelope cannot enter the tower, so you will
not be able to receive their help. Are you okay with
that?<stop_lip_animation n00257 CLOSE_MOUTH>

386.<voice 01570_00000386><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01570_00000386><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>, you're here because my father told you
to come, right? I'm going on ahead!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

387.<voice 01762_00000387><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01762_00000387><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I wonder why they're following me... You guys can't
enter Sui Tower.<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

388.<voice 01838_00000388><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01838_00000388><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Azlantelopes sure are dumb, aren't they?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

389.<voice 00005_00000389><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00005_00000389><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>We're finally here...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

390.<voice 00169_00000390><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00169_00000390><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Somehow, we made it...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

391.<voice 00273_00000391><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00273_00000391><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>For all the help you gave me...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

392.<voice 00343_00000392><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00343_00000392><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Th... Thank you!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

395.<voice 00594_00000395><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00594_00000395><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Did you maybe hear that just now? I... I was just
thanking them. It doesn't mean I approve of the
Azlantelopes!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

397.<voice 00737_00000397><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00737_00000397><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Why are these Azlantelopes helping me?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

398.<voice 00819_00000398><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00819_00000398><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Do they feel bad that they let my mother die? Or...
Is it because I'm a Wind Rider who can bring out their
power?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

399.<voice 00974_00000399><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00974_00000399><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>Azlantelopes sure are... Odd creatures, aren't they?<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

400.<voice 01183_00000400><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01183_00000400><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>The Wind Robe is at the top of this tower...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
